00053 class MIXIM_API UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel : public AnalogueModel {
00054 
00055 public:
00056     virtual ~UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel() {}
00057 
00058     static const double Gtx;
00059     static const double Grx;
00060     static const double ntx;
00061     static const double nrx;
00062     double PL0; // 0.000008913; // -50.5 dB   0.000019953
00063     static const double fc; // mandatory band 3, center frequency, MHz
00064     static const double d0;
00065     double mu_gamma, sigma_gamma; //1.7, 0.3
00066     double mu_sigma, sigma_sigma;
00067     double gamma, S, sigma;
00068     double n1, n2, n3;
00069     static double n1_limit;
00070     static double n2_limit;
00071 
00072     static const double s_mu;
00073     static const double s_sigma;
00074     static const double kappa;

00077 
00078     cOutVector distances;

00082     std::string myName;
00083 
00084     UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel(double _PL0, double _mu_gamma, double _sigma_gamma, double _mu_sigma, double _sigma_sigma, bool _enabled, bool _shadowing=true)
00085       : AnalogueModel()
00086       , PL0(_PL0)
00087       , mu_gamma(_mu_gamma), sigma_gamma(_sigma_gamma)
00088       , mu_sigma(_mu_sigma), sigma_sigma(_sigma_sigma)
00089       , gamma(0.0), S(0.0), sigma(0.0)
00090       , n1(0.0), n2(0.0), n3(0.0)
00091       , isEnabled(_enabled)
00092       , shadowing(_shadowing)
00093       , distances()
00094       , srcPosX(), srcPosY(), dstPosX(), dstPosY()
00095       , myIndex(-1)
00096       , myName()
00097       , pathloss_exponent(0.0)
00098       , fading(0.0)
00099       , frequency("frequency")
00100       , pathlosses()
00101     {
00102       distances.setName("distances");
00103       srcPosX.setName("srcPosX");
00104       srcPosY.setName("srcPosY");
00105       dstPosX.setName("dstPosX");
00106       dstPosY.setName("dstPosY");
00107       pathlosses.setName("pathloss");
00108     }
00109 
00110     void filterSignal(AirFrame *, const Coord&, const Coord&);
00111 
00112 protected:
00113     double pathloss_exponent;
00114     double fading;
00115     Dimension frequency;
00116     cOutVector pathlosses;  // outputs computed pathlosses. Allows to compute Eb = Epulse*pathloss for Eb/N0 computations. (N0 is the noise sampled by the receiver)
00117 
00118     static double getNarrowBandFreeSpacePathloss(double fc, double distance);
